body.name: EKSA USB Gaming Headset for PC - Computer Headset with Detachable Noise Cancelling Mic, 7.1 Surround Sound, 50MM Driver - Headphones with Microphone for PS4/PS5, Xbox One, Laptop, Gamer
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 56 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 14 hrs 56 mins
features: 【Removable Dual Interfaces Wired Design】 Both USB and 3.5mm audio interfaces with two removable audio cords offer several alternatives and diverse sounds. The wired gaming headset is compatible with most mobile devices, PC, PS4, PS5 and Xbox One. (Note: 7.1 surround sound is only available on PC with a USB cable.)

【Immersive 7.1 Virtual Surround Sound】 The 7.1 surround sound creates an immersive gaming experience. Every subtle sound, music, and effect from various directions in the game is more pronounced and detailed for you to identify enemy positions, avoid surprise attacks, and defeat the enemy easily. You're practically immersed in a world of your own.

【Detachable Noise-Cancelling Microphone】High-sensitive, unidirectional noise-canceling microphone can effectively reduce background noise and pick up your voice clearly. EKSA E900 Pro gaming headphones for PS4/PS5 console also features a user-friendly one key mic mute switch and volume adjustment for smooth gaming operations. This noise-canceling mic provides specific sound imaging and is great for in-game chat, skype, working, and studying.

【All-Day Comfort】The adjustable headband is designed for your comfort in a way that balances weight distribution and reduces clamping force on your head. The soft memory protein earmuffs also help to take away all discomfort that might be associated with lengthy gaming sessions. You won't feel a thing wearing this 7.1 gaming headphone for hours on end.

【2-Year Warranty】EKSA gaming headsets are tailored specifically to satisfy our customers. Everything we do is to ensure you have a memorable shopping experience. We offer a 2-Year warranty and an unconditional 30-day money-back guarantee. If you have any requests or suggestions for our products, please do not hesitate to contact us.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 23 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would recommend for anyone!!
reviews.reviewText: Love the quality and they are so comfortable and love that they are lightweight and don’t hurt the ears like most headset do when I have my glasses on!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made a great Christmas present
reviews.reviewText: My nephew wanted some good quality headphones and I gave these to him. Now he can listen to music or whatever else he wants without disturbing his mom and dad. According to my nephew the sound is good and nothing can be heard by anyone else unless the volume is turned too far on his devices. They fit comfortably on a teen boy's head but it looks like they can be adjusted a bit for other people too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good headphones but has high mic sensitivity
reviews.reviewText: The headphones are great, the only issue we ran into is the mic sensitivity is high even when you adjust your settings. So sometimes you can hear the person's game through calls, but it isn't crazy and can kind of be adjusted but isn't perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for gaming. Was impressed with the quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Average Product with Above Average Price
reviews.reviewText: Came with all the necessary cables but must admit minor disappointment with the length of the primary cable. That's minor compared to the major disatisfaction with audio quality both in and out. The Over-the-Ear fitting was slightly uncomfortable. Liked the fact that the controls didn't weigh down the cables since they were mounted on one ear piece.I purposely paid a little extra for better audio pleasure but did not achieve my objective. Don't know how to remediate this for the inevitable next iteration. I am not an audiophile but would love to derive better results without seeking financing options.Ubuntu recognized the device as soon as it was plugged but there are no 7.1 drivers. The microphone recording is sub-standard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and clear sound
reviews.reviewText: These headphones were clear sounding, had a great mic, and didn’t hurt my head after using them for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable. Sound is good with adjustable volume on the headsest.
reviews.reviewText: Overall great. Only had them a week but so far so great. I am curious how long the detachable microphone will last since it is bendable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
